nodes.text: Krayt was a Lambda-class T-4a shuttle under the employ the Galactic Empire.

The shuttle was on its way to the Bonadan system with inspectors to verify the cargo of several Cargo containers that were being loaded by space tugs and BFF-1 bulk freighters were to pick up the containers. However, two Y-wings were sent by the Rebel Alliance to destroy most, if not all the containers to deprive the Empire of the resources that the containers were to provide. The shuttle soon arrived and was shot down and destroyed before it could escape. The incident was recorded as the first training mission for new pilots.
